title: Rei Zero
synopsis: Tokyo fell into ruins following the consecutive great earthquakes of 2014. As a result, the new city center is built in the location of the former Nishitokyo. Meanwhile, Shinjuku and the submerged Minato wards devolved into slum areas. Further, due to the Immigration Laws of 2040, these slums saw an influx of refugees, mafioso, and terrorists, and is now the leading crime capital of the world.
staff: [['Yoshida, Tomohiro', ['Sound Director']], ['Yakushi, Ruri', ['Theme Song Composition', ' Theme Song Performance', ' Theme Song Lyrics']], ['Lilith Soft', ['Original Creator']], ['Nishi, Shigenari', ['Editing']]]
